typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as integer '000',
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp 'MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss a'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100) ~> custadr
source(output(
		rowguid as string,
		{Name } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> custnames
custadr, custnames join(Column_1 == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
custnames, custadr join(custnames@rowguid == custadr@rowguid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 filter(City == 'Bothell') ~> Filter1
